channel.title: Help with HomeWork! (6th grade work xD)
channel.description:
I tried googling 100s of times.
* - A 50/50 meh problem, but I still need them.
Ok, here:
#3: What were four key problems faced Mesopotamians? *How did Mesopotamians attempt to meet each challenge?
#4: How did the Mesopotamians attempt to meet there challenges result in the formation of Sumerian city-states?
Ok, for the final piece, I NEED HELP:
Write the date that the event occurred:
Food shortages in foothills of Zagros Mountains Sumerian villages Sumerian walled city-states
Please help
I'll think of giving someone something out..
EDIT: I'm done here... Mods, you can lock, preferably delete this topic

item.title: Help with HomeWork! (6th grade work xD)
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

I tried googling 100s of times.

    • A 50/50 meh problem, but I still need them.

Ok, here:

#3: What were four key problems faced Mesopotamians? *How did Mesopotamians attempt to meet each challenge?

#4: How did the Mesopotamians attempt to meet there challenges result in the formation of Sumerian city-states?

Ok, for the final piece, I NEED HELP:

Write the date that the event occurred:

Food shortages in foothills of Zagros Mountains
Sumerian villages
Sumerian walled city-states

Please help

I’ll think of giving someone something out…

EDIT: I’m done here… Mods, you can lock, preferably delete this topic
